title: Eschickon Wheat Segmentation
description: Pest control through image segmentation and image classification of whether the plant is healthy or not. Implemented with the conventional approach and deep learning (U-Net and DeepLabV3+).

title: SERP Model Performance Analysis
description: Built and analyzed the performance of Large Language Model (LLM) with GPT (Generative Pre-trained Transformer) models on SERP (Search Engine Results Page)

title: Movie Search Engine and Wiki Web Application
description: A Web Application for searching Marvel or DC movies queried with SPARQL, and data saved in RDF model. Implemented Levenshtein Distance for handling mistyped search results with FuzzyWuzzy.

title: Multimodal Speech Emotion Recognition and Ambiguity Resolution
description: Research on Speech Emotion Recognition by classifying types of emotions from text and audio data. The models were built in two approaches, ML and DL-based.

title: NuTrack
description: Nutrition tracker super-app, available for web- and mobile-based. Involved in handling the backend and frontend for the dashboard feature of calorie calculator.

title: Fancom
description: A community and marketplace for creative enthusiasts in Indonesia. Contributed to fancom.app's development by using the latest technologies (Next.js, React, tRPC, GitLab CI/CD) and managed to win the award as Best Start-Up Project for extraordinary achievements during the entire software development cycle in the past 6 months.

title: TravelLabel
description: A forum discussion and interactive map for tourists. Be responsible for providing maps dataset, building, and training models with TensorFlow, and also leading the team to help them organize the team members' work by holding a weekly stand-up meeting.

title: StudyMate
description: A mobile-based platform to assist high school students in their plans to study abroad. Conducted research on user experience to meet the needs of potential early users and designed a prototype.

title: EL-CODER
description: A Real-Time based Learning Management System that can help students to get guidance in learning competitive programming. Research the needs of potential users, design the course mapping, and design the prototype.

title: Air Quality Dashboard
description: A dashboard that can provide insight into the current air quality based on the pollutants produced. Design, EDA, and visualization of air quality data.
